features: 💜【Smart Watch with Text and Call】Ultralight women's watch,Bluetooth connection,you can answer/dial directly through this watch.When you are exercising or in a meeting, even if your phone is in your pocket, all the information will be on your wrist,vibrate for incoming calls,information reminder (Facebook,WhatsApp,Instagram,Tiktok,Twitter,etc.)you won't miss any message.(not supported reply)

💟【Fashionable and Thin Design】Silver metal frame with 1.7” HD full touch screen,bring comfortable touch and excellent visual experience.IP67 Waterproof, no need to take off the watch when washing hands, meeting daily waterproof requirements. Don't worry about sweat or rain corroding your waterproof watch

💜【DIY Your Watch Face】There are 100+ free dials within the app for you to choose,you can also customize your watch faces with your favorite photo,family,friend,pet,etc.Women's smarst watch with 2 silicone straps,soft and elastic,it's a good gift for women

💟【Caring About Your Health】Colesma smart watch can measure heart rate,blood pressure,blood oxygen,built-in photoelectric sensor,provides you with 24-hour health monitoring.You can also use the Female Physiological Cycle, Drink Reminder and Sedentary Reminder features to help you make reasonable adjustment on your lifestyle.(Note: The data is for reference only, please don't use it for medical purposes)

💜【Multiple Sports Modes】This fitness watch supports 8 sports modes:walking,running,cycling,skipping,badminton, basketball,football,swimming.fitness tracker can also accurately track calories, distance, steps, exercise time and heart rate.Let you exercise scientifically to achieve your sports goals

💟【Discover More Features】Magnetic suction charging,230mAh large capacity battery,2.5h fully charged, 3-7 days long battery life, 30 days standby time (depending on personal usage).Supports Android 4.4, iOS 7.1 and above.Weather,alarm clock,timer,flashlight,More features waiting for you to discover

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Android & iOS Women Smartwatch-Bluetooth Call Ultralight Ladies Smartwatch,silver metal frame with1.7” HD full touch screen,bring comfortable touch and excellent visual experience. 2 replaceable silicone watch bands(purple&white),soft and elastic, comfortable to wear. HI-FI waterproof speakers,after bluetooth connection,you can answer/reject calls directly through the watch,you can also dial on the watch to make calls.The watch support adding 8 Frequent contacts.APP message notification (Facebook,WhatsApp,Instagram,Tiktok,Twitter,etc.) When you are exercising or in a meeting,even if your phone is in your pocket,all the information will be on your wrist won't miss any message.Compatible with smartphones Android 4.0+ and iOS 7.1+,not supported reply.

DIY Your Own Watch Face- Show Your Style There are 100+ free dials within the app for you to choose,you can also customize your watch faces with your favorite photo,family,friend,pet,etc.Fashion meet function,this is a very meaningful gift for yourself and your friends.

All Day Activity & Fitness Tracker This fitness watch supports 8 sports:walking,running,cycling,skipping,badminton,basketball,etc.Colesma fitness tracker can also accurately track calories, distance, steps, exercise time and heart rate.Let you exercise scientifically to achieve your sports goalsIP67 waterproof,so you don't need to take off while washing your hands (note: not suitable for diving, swimming or sauna.)

All-Round Health Monitoring Heart Rate/Blood Pressure/SPO2,Colesma smart watch built-in high-sensitivity sensor,the watch can accurately monitor your health data,focus on your health status.Sleep Tracker: Smart watch has automatic monitoring and analysis of your sleep quality, sleep duration, sleep stage (deep sleep, light sleep and wake up). You can open the APP to view your data, it can better help you adjust your work and rest. (Note: The data is for reference only, please don't use it for medical purposes)

Humanized Design Customize the raise to wake time to avoid screen light from disturbing your restBuilt-in Do Not Disturb mode, when this mode is turned on, you will not receive call and message notifications More Useful Functions Music player & camera remote controlWeather checkDrink water/sedentary reminder More functions are waiting for you to discover. USB Magnetic Charging 230mAh large capacity battery2.5h fully charged,3-7 battery life.Different usage habits have different working hours

Functional Overview Note The smartwatch monitoring data is for reference only and cannot be used for medical purposes.Recommended the charging adapter voltage is 5V. DON’T use over 5V/2A power adapter to charge it.The smart watch will not be able to connect if the battery is less than 20%,Bluetooth connection distance is 8-10m.We don't recommend you to wear this watch in hot shower, spa, sauna (steam room). If you have any other problems, please feel free to contact the seller for help, we will reply you within 24 hours. ( Go to Your Order--> Find the order ID in the list--> Click 'Contact with us' )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this watch for my daughter,she's 10,she loves it. As described, smart watch,sport,rest,bp checks,phone features,customizable display and alot more. I will definitely be buying again... It can on time well packaged,so that's a plus . It comes with a charger,no adapter and s manual. The bands can be be changed so it can be customized to your liking. 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product / Great Service
reviews.reviewText: This is my first smart watch. I feel it is a great value for the money. The few questions I have had were answered very promptly and the seller has even followed up a few times to ensure I was still happy with the product. That kind of customer service is unheard of these days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I don't like is that I can't have my Bluetooth on while wearing the watch. When my phone rings it goes straight through the watch and not my phone. People can't hear me though the watch. Otherwise would have given 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No user manual included
reviews.reviewText: I actually love this watch. It took several attempts to get the various features to work. Without a user manual I was able to use the Amazon troubleshooting section. Those instructions were close to being helpful. Several time I had to interpret the instructions using the "maybe they mean..." guessing. Now it's a matter of getting accustom to the features. Time will no doubt take care of that. For these reasons I rated it a 3. However, now that I have things figured out I wouldn't trade it for the world. I highly recommend they include user manual or access to a website for a user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm lovin' it!
reviews.reviewText: Although it is a bit too big for my wrist,I still like all the functions. I like how you can change out the wrist bands because mine tends to get dirty since I have 8 month old twins. The Speaker is great, you can hear really good Compared to other watches. I mainly got the watch to call and listen to music. The vitals and sleep functions aren't too accurate. But I have tried out 4 different watches and none of them are accurate. So all in all this watch I like the best!I wish they made a watch that you can talk and text within this price range 😒

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Most trackings are inaccurate
reviews.reviewText: This watch was easy to pair but setting the app is not very easy to use. The battery life is not so great either. I'm very disappointed in the exaggerated step tracking, and bp tracking. I know the bp tracking will not be totally accurate but it was not even close to my real bp. The good things about this product is the phone and messages worked fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very neat and nice look
reviews.reviewText: I really liked how it looks beautiful and original however I couldn't use it because of color didn't match to my most outfits. I really like to match or adjust my things. I wish they would have more colors. I am giving 5 star for it is look. Other reviews tells you quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars App was confusing, steps way off, broke after a week
reviews.reviewText: This is my second smart watch ever. The app was not great. The steps were crazy off. I got up to go to the bathroom in the night and accrued 126 steps. Other days, I would be working outside all day and have 1200 steps. The charge lasted about 3 days which was not long. It shut down after about a week.
